description.en: Retrieve information about a DeepBook liquidity pool by querying the pool object.
description.de: Rufe Informationen über einen DeepBook-Liquiditätspool ab, indem das Pool-Objekt abgefragt wird.

description.en: The DeepBook pool object ID to query.
description.de: Die DeepBook-Pool-Objekt-ID, die abgefragt werden soll.

output.POOL_TYPE: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.POOL_DATA; return data?.data?.type || data?.type || 'Unknown'; }
output.POOL_ID: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.POOL_DATA; return data?.data?.objectId || data?.objectId || 'Unknown'; }
